Happy Anniversary.  My watch is over.  5 years.  I volunteered and honored it.  I've seen and heard things unspeakable I never wanted to see or hear.  It's been an honor.  Your an amazing woman.  I already know where I'm going to store your ring once I can afford to buy it.  The choice is yours.  If it's 1 it's monogamous until the end.  If it's 2 it's monogamous celebacy until the end.  If it's 3 I'm the entire Universe dressed as a pretty well maintained vagrant until the end.  A full natural life that's the rule then we can choose before Him.  I'll give you 2 years from this date to decide because He wants me physically retired in a Man suit not the Ghost that if tonight was the end I would be.  There's alot of vengeance with that Ghost.  Got work in the morning.  Have a good night.  My wife, my daughter and my friend.

Love,
Josh.

How can I express how awful I find this song.  I was in the grocery store yesterday, and the chorus of this song just kept repeating and repeating and repeating and repeating.  AAAAAGGGGHHH!!!  I began looking for the shaving products so I could kill myself.  This is just another attempt by Katy Perry to sell records to insecure girls through her trademark magic of musical yelling and merciless repetition, which worked equally well with "Firework."  Truly, the ceaseless Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, and the way she "sings" the word "roar" and the loudness of the whole pile of dung got me out of that store in record time.  That place lost money because they played this "song."
